data.message: I respect shady he try with d12 and seems 50 was acting like them.but i like white guys had one for a bestfriend 5 year where i live with my girl.i live in a condoms with all white people i use yo hustle.but a lady was owner.so back to shady.i am the best rapper really i run you tube.mr rakeem.now if shady give me a chance he would feel the same.i can rap soul music horror love music.no i am best in the world
